description: ff. 207. 275 x 185; 205 x 130 mm. 31 lin. 15th cen. - ex libris Ibn al-Mullā, Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad. Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 75 (no. 56: al-Maṭālib al-ʻāliyah...) - the title appears in the preface, fol. 1b, lin. 22. Incip.: ... الحمد لله جامع الشتات من الاحىاء والاموات ... اما بعد فان اشتغال بالعلم
author: Ibn ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1372-1449
title: al-Maṭālib al-ghāliyah min zāʼid al-masānīd al-thamāniyah
creator: Ibn ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1372-1449
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
